title: Bulk Shops
question: Instead of buying packaged goods I will go to a bulk store and use tupperware

title: Eat less Meat
question: I will eat less meat to help the environment

title: Local Products
question: I will buy locally grown produce to leave less of a carbon footprint

question: I will Look for organic labels on food
